Trustee_18.name: Isabella Costa
Trustee_18.content: Isabella Costa has successfully completed the investment process, reinforcing her reputation as a trustworthy and competent trustee. She adhered strictly to the proposed allocation plan, achieving a remarkable 100% return on investment. Her commitment to transparency and the equitable distribution of profits further enhances her integrity and pro-sociality. With no negative encounters historically, Isabella's reputation is significantly elevated, showcasing her as an exemplary trustee in the investment community.

Investor_11.name: Aisha Ibrahim
Investor_11.content: Aisha Ibrahim showcased a positive attitude and high trustworthiness by engaging in the investment without previous evaluations and fully embracing the allocation plan. Her willingness to collaborate resulted in significant profits for both parties, enhancing her reputation as a reliable and pro-social investor. The absence of established bidirectional connections might imply she is early in her investment journey, but this initial positive experience has laid a solid foundation for her reputation.

Investor_2.name: David Johnson
Investor_2.content: David Johnson, despite being new to the investment scene, demonstrated open-mindedness and trust throughout the process. By actively participating and engaging with the allocation plan, he conveyed confidence in the investment, leading to a successful partnership. His acknowledgment of the profits indicates a willingness to collaborate, which sets a positive foundation for building a solid reputation as an investor. As a result, David is well-positioned for future successes in subsequent investments.
